topComments.comment: This is where you can meet Anna and Elsa! It was great!! Daughter's 7 and 10 were soooo excited. Had a chocolate covered pretzel thing and a Grapefruit beer! Both very good!

topComments.author: Lyly Feliciano
topComments.comment: Really pretty. Make sure to check out the small museum featuring the Norse gods. It's a little hidden but you just need to open the door. There is also a small bakery and coffee shop that has some delicious drinks and treats. Don't forget to check out the Frozen ride while you're there.

topComments.author: Jackie F
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu amo, amo, AMO o pavilh√£o da Noruega! √â ador√°vel com o verdadeiro charme da Noruega. Os biscoitos do Kringla Bakeri Og Kafe s√£o DELICIOSOS - com um delicioso toque de canela. Vista perfeita do p√¥r do sol desta √°rea tamb√©m!  (Original) I love, love, LOVE the Norway pavilion! It's adorable with true charm of Norway. The cookies in the Kringla Bakeri Og Kafe are DELICIOUS- with a yummy hint of cinnamon. Perfect view of the sunset from this area as well!

topComments.author: Robert Thomas
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O Pavilh√£o da Noruega tem uma das melhores lojas de presentes do Epcot, tem uma boa variedade de mercadorias e est√° sempre bem abastecido. O tema √© feito nesta √°rea de forma t√≠pica da Disney sem nenhum detalhe ignorado. O elenco √© sempre super amig√°vel e se esfor√ßa para ser √∫til. O passeio Frozen Ever After √© um retrofit fofo da atra√ß√£o Maelstrom anterior, embora um pouco caricatural para o Epcot. No geral, nos dois principais pavilh√µes de pa√≠ses favoritos para visitar no Epcot, empatado com o M√©xico.  (Original) The Norway Pavilion has one of the best gift shops at Epcot, has a good variety of merchandise and is always well stocked.  The theme is done in this area in typical Disney fashion with no detail ignored. The cast are always super friendly and go out of their way to be helpful. The Frozen Ever After ride is a cute retrofit of the previous Maelstrom attraction, if a little cartoonish for Epcot. Overall in the top two favorite country pavilions to visit at Epcot, tied with Mexico.

It's not where you get on the Frozen ride. Trust me, you'll be so comfortable here.
